title: Etoposide
summary: Etoposide, sold under the brand name Vepesid among others, is a chemotherapy medication used for the treatments of a number of types of cancer including testicular cancer, lung cancer, lymphoma, leukemia, neuroblastoma, and ovarian cancer.[1] It is also used for hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis.[2] It is used by mouth or injection into a vein.[1]
